entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:28 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: E 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the water this evening. Wind becoming light before morning. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of thunderstorms and hail in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
